div.p: This code system https://fhir-vaccination-pass.github.io/fhir-implementation-guide/CodeSystem/vp-vaccination-scheme-type defines the following codes:

tr.td: Standard scheme that should be followed in most cases
Fast scheme that can be used if an accelerated immunization process is desired
Scheme that includes only repeating immunizations to refresh the protection

description.value: Describes the type of a vaccination scheme such as standard, quick or repeating

display.value: Standard scheme that should be followed in most cases
Fast scheme that can be used if an accelerated immunization process is desired
Scheme that includes only repeating immunizations to refresh the protection
